Home.desc: I've always had a passion for  the vast field of computer science, in particular software development, which allows me to express my creativity and be innovative.

About.title: About
About.par1: Currently studying for a Master 1 in Software and Intelligent Systems Engineering, with a Bachelor in Software Engineering, my interest in programming began when I started playing video games. Their development aroused my curiosity.
About.par2: After majoring in computer science, my attention shifted to software development, where I felt like I was drawing with code.
About.par3: Aside from programming, I have a variety of interests, including drawing, reading, photography, and video games.
About.par4: Here are some of the technologies I've worked with:

list.title: BotsCompete
list.desc: Secure competitve e-learning platform about machine learning challenges.

list.title: Walmart Recruiting Store Sales Forecasting
list.desc: Predicting the weekly sales of the Walmart historical sales dataset.

list.title: Thiqa - Mobile Application
list.desc: A mobile app that allows you to submit a request for a commercial register in order to have the necessary permissions to establish a business.

list.title: Assurini - Administrator management website
list.desc: A website that allows you to manage the data of insurance companies and plans as well as viewing the general statistics of the app's data.

Contact.par: If my profile interests you, and you believe that my motivation meets the requirements of your universities,
Contact.span: don't hesitate to contact me by e-mail or via Linked In.
